title: President Rajapaksa appoints former SG Sarath Fernando as new AG
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Former Solicitor General, President’s Counsel Sarath Palitha Fernando was sworn in as the new Attorney General of Sri Lanka before President Mahinda Rajapaksa a short while ago at Temple Trees. Secretary to the President, Lalith Weeratunga was present at the occasion….
